## What is USB Fix Free?

USB Fix Free is a utility software developed by Sosvirus that helps users remove viruses and malware from their USB drives. The tool is entirely free and doesn't require any installation since it can run from the USB drive itself.

USB Fix Free is an excellent solution to protect your computer against potential threats that can occur when using external storage devices. The software is compatible with all versions of Windows and is continuously updated to tackle the latest types of malware.

## How does it work?

USB Fix Free operates by scanning your USB sticks and other external devices for any malware, viruses, adware, or other malicious software. The software automatically removes any harmful files it detects without requiring any action from the user.

Additionally, USB Fix Free can also repair damaged files or folders that may have been caused by a virus attack. The recovery feature can be particularly helpful when dealing with essential files that are not replaceable.

## Key features of USB Fix Free

Here are some of the notable features that make USB Fix Free stand out as an effective USB virus removal tool:

- Completely free to use
- Doesn't require any installation
- Automatically detects and removes viruses
- Repairs damaged files and folders
- Includes a basic antivirus scanner for your computer
- Intuitive and easy-to-use interface

## How to use USB Fix Free

Using USB Fix Free is effortless, thanks to its user-friendly interface. Here's how to use the software to remove viruses from your USB drives:

1. Download USB Fix Free from Sosvirus's website.
2. Plug in your USB drive to your computer.
3. Run the USB Fix Free executable file.
4. Click on the "Research" button to start the scan.
5. Wait for the scan to complete.
6. Click on the "Clean" button to remove any detected viruses.

After the cleaning process is complete, the tool will create a report letting you know if any viruses were found and removed.

## Final thoughts

In conclusion, USB Fix Free is a reliable and straightforward solution for removing viruses and malware from your USB drives. Not only does it protect your external storage devices, but it also has a basic antivirus scanner for your computer.

If you're looking for an effective, one-stop-shop solution to help secure and protect your computer against potential threats, USB Fix Free is definitely worth considering.
